titleStmt.title: A sermon preached to the Honourable House of Commons assembled in Parliament at their pvbliqve fast, Novem. 17, 1640 by Cornelius Burges.
titleStmt.author: Burges, Cornelius, 1589?-1665.
Marshall, Stephen, 1594?-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Badger, for P. Stephens and C. Meredith ...,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Cornelius Burges, Stephen Marshall.
Also published as the first sermon in his Two sermons ... London, 1641.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
